text: @DrDenaGrayson Asians always! Asians eat exotic animals and stay near to them. The world just has to stop any from this region of the world. Let them in this crazy hurricane alone! They don't care for us! They opened wet markets just 2 month after the #COVID19. DO NOT BRING ANY FROM ASIA!
